participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Curious and warm-hearted, Emma enjoys connecting with others and exploring new ideas.
participant_1.background: I love traveling. I like photography. I like to bake pies. I like to garden.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Passionate and ambitious, Liam strives to make a mark in the music world and is driven by his dreams.
participant_2.background: Both my parents are creative. I dream of playing music for a living. My dad works in the automotive industry. I'm a student living at home while pursuing my music industry degree. Mom in telecommunications.

content.text: Hey!
Hey!
I'm interested in learning more about your music industry degree.
Sure, what would you like to know?
What are some of the things you've learned so far?
I've learned a lot about the business side of music, like how to market and promote your music, how to get your music distributed, and how to make money from your music.
That sounds really interesting! What are some of your favorite classes?
I really enjoy my music business class and my music production class. I'm also learning a lot about songwriting in my music theory class.
Do you think you'll be able to get a job in the music industry after you graduate?
I'm hoping so! I've been networking with people in the industry and I'm working on building my portfolio.
That's great! I'm sure you'll be successful.
Thanks! I hope so!
So, what kind of music do you like to play?
I like to play all sorts of music, but my favorite is probably rock music.
Rock music is great! I love to go to concerts.
Me too! I've been to a few concerts this year.
That's awesome! Who did you see?
I saw Twenty One Pilots, Billie Eilish, and The 1975.
Those are all great bands! I saw Billie Eilish a few months ago. She was amazing!
She was! I'm so glad I got to see her.
So, what are you doing after graduation?
I'm not sure yet. I'm hoping to get a job in the music industry, but I'm also considering going to graduate school.
That's a tough decision. I'm sure you'll make the right choice.
Thanks! I hope so!
Well, it was nice talking to you!
You too!
